origination.corpname: University of Michigan. Nursing History Society.

did.unittitle: Nursing History Society (University of Michigan) records 1940-1995
did.abstract: Society formed in 1983 with the purpose of engaging in activities directed toward the preservation of the history of nursing at the University of Michigan. Administrative files, 1983-1989, including minutes, programs, membership materials, and reports; and historical files, ca. 1940-ca. 1988, collected respecting nursing history, including class notes, nursing manuals, oral history tapes, and photographs.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The records are the gift of the Nursing History Society (Donor no. 7051). Periodic additions are expected.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to research.

userestrict.p: Copyright is held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Nursing History Society (University of Michigan) Records, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: The Nursing History Society of the University of Michigan was officially organized by Linda Strodtman in the summer of 1983, with the purpose of engaging in activities directed toward the preservation of the history at the University of Michigan. The activities of the organization include researching and recording aspects of nursing history at the University of Michigan and educating others about nursing history through the sponsoring of educational programs and the assembling of historical material. Other activities include mounting exhibits and presenting lectures on nursing history.

scopecontent.p: The records fo the nurisng History Scoiety consist of Administrative files, 1983-1989, including minutes, programs, membership materials, and reports; and historical files, ca. 1940-ca. 1988, collected respecting nursing history, including class notes, nursing manuals, oral history tapes, and photographs. The records have been arranged into three series: Organizational Records, 19821995, Historical Files, 1936-1984, and Audio-Visual Material, 1966-1984.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: Nursing--Michigan--Ann Arbor.
controlaccess.corpname: University of Michigan. Nursing History Society.
University of Michigan. School of Nursing.

scopecontent.p: The Organizational Records series, 1983-1995, 0.25 linear ft., is comprised of the administrative files of the Society itself. Among materials included are annual reports, meeting minutes and agendas, correspondence regarding Society sponsored programming and the donation of materials, officer lists, program announcements and treasurer's reports.

did.unittitle: Centennial Calendar, "A Century of Leadership: Nursing at the University of Michigan, 1891-1991"

scopecontent.p: The Historical Files series, which spans 1.25 linear ft., contains materials pertaining to the history of nursing, collected by the society. Excepting one folder of issues of the Cadet Nurse Corps News published by the U.S. Public Health Service Division of Nurse Education, and one unidentified photocopy of a letter from 1889 describing war-time nursing conditions, all of these materials relate to the teaching and practice of nursing at the University of Michigan. The bulk of the series is comprised of class notes and instructional materials dating from 1936 to 1962. In cases in which the professor or student of the class whose materials they were was identified, this name has been included in parentheses in the box list below. Also of interest in this series are several nursing handbooks and manuals for use by nurses at the University of Michigan hospital.

did.unittitle: Handbook for Nurse Aides, 1965 and undated
Manual of Diagnostic Procedures for Nurses, 1968

scopecontent.p: The Audio-Visual Material series, which spans .25 linear feet, is comprised of two oral history tape reels, recorded in 1966, and photographs of hospital nursing staff, dated 1978-1984, and the 1984 attendants of the Gordon Research Center Proctor Academy in Laconia, New Hampshire.

physdesc.physfacet: (2 tapes, 7 inch, 7-1/2 ips and unknown ips
